wf:

/-- The "greater than" relation on `upto p` is well founded if (and only if) there exists a value
satisfying `p`. -/
protected theorem wf : (∃ x, p x) → well_founded (Upto.GT p)
  | ⟨x, h⟩ =>
    by
    suffices upto.gt p = measure fun y : Nat.Upto p => x - y.val
      by
      rw [this]
      apply measure_wf
    ext (⟨a, ha⟩⟨b, _⟩)
    dsimp [measure, inv_image, upto.gt]
    rw [tsub_lt_tsub_iff_left_of_le]
    exact le_of_not_lt fun h' => ha _ h' h
#align wf wf
